name: Simon Says (Media Club @ Florida Poly)
description: Welcome to Simon Says! Focus while a pattern is played to you and remember it. Repeat the pattern back to proceed. If you successfully repeat the pattern you gain a point, but the difficulty will also increase! Try to set a new high score! This game was made for the Florida Poly Media Club for a workshop livestream. Tune in to https://www.twitch.tv/fpmclub on Thursday, September 26th at 6:00PM to learn how this game was developed and how you can expand upon it!
